dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: noteLink
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table links note made by a database user or manager to a specific table, record and attribute in the database.
entity.entityDescription: This table was developed with the goal of keeping all the notes associated with the plots in a single table rather than distributed in many tables across the database.

attribute.attNotes: Primary key for the noteLink table
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique noteLink.
Name of the table that the note is associated with.
Name of the attribute in the table (stored in tableName) that the note is associated with.
The record number (row) containing the value with which the note is associated (which translates to the primary key value for the table wherein the 'attributeName' is stored).
